<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Snare Commando](/Feats.aspx?ID=2388) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kobold" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=224" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 39 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Snare Crafting](/Feats.aspx?ID=843); Expert in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) or Expert in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7)

**Trigger**
A creature fails or critically fails a save against your [snare](/Traits.aspx?ID=146).

</column>

---

Your snares are so befuddling that your victims rarely notice you slipping out of sight. If you have expert proficiency in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5), you can [Create a Diversion](/Actions.aspx?ID=45) against the triggering creature. If you have expert proficiency in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7), you can instead [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) the triggering creature. If you have both, choose one of the two effects.

prerequisite: Snare Crafting; Expert in Deception or Expert in Intimidation
